attractions.name: Burj Khalifa
attractions.description: Experience breathtaking views of Dubai from the observation deck at the world's tallest building.
attractions.location: 1 Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Blvd - Downtown Dubai

attractions.name: Dubai Mall
attractions.description: The largest mall in the world, featuring countless shops, an aquarium, and an ice rink.

attractions.name: The Dubai Fountain
attractions.description: Enjoy the spectacular fountain shows set to music and lights in the Burj Lake.

attractions.name: The Palm Jumeirah
attractions.description: A man-made island known for its luxurious hotels, beach clubs, and the Atlantis hotel.

attractions.name: Dubai Aquarium & Underwater Zoo
attractions.description: Experience an impressive underwater zoo and a massive aquarium with diverse marine life.

attractions.name: Al Fahidi Historical Neighborhood
attractions.description: Explore the charming heritage district with art galleries, museums, and traditional architecture.

attractions.name: Jumeirah Beach
attractions.description: Relax on the beautiful public beach with stunning views of the Burj Al Arab.

attractions.name: The Global Village
attractions.description: A cultural and entertainment destination featuring pavilions from different countries.

attractions.name: Desert Safari
attractions.description: Experience thrilling dune bashing, camel rides, and traditional Bedouin dinners.

attractions.name: Dubai Creek
attractions.description: Enjoy a traditional abra ride on the creek and explore the vibrant markets.
